author: vinnie87
body:
Version: 0.0.7
Features:
- Path ordering,
- value from CLOB,
- parameter value tooltip.
  Fixes:
- Path ordering: Toggle function on Path name header column to order
  the paths without affecting modules and sequences order;
- Value store in CLOB included;
- ES Modules parameters parent key;
- parameters building order: incorrect parameter order from db query
  resulted in error in parameters building. Fixed by adding order by
  statement in the queries.
title: Confdb - WebApp - CMSWeb candidate Release v0.0.7
